item.title: Pro Tips for Grad Students in Statistics/Biostatistics (Part 2)
item.description: This is the second in my series on pro tips for graduate students in statistics/biostatistics. For more tips, see part 1. Meet with seminar speakers. When you go on the job market face recognition is priceless. I met Scott Zeger at UW when I was a student. When I came for an interview I already knew him (and Ingo, and Rafa, and ….). An even better idea…ask a question during the seminar.
